Choose one or three –
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
• Sacrifice a creature. Angel's Resolve deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
• Conjure a card named Fatigue on top of your library. [i](It's a colorless sorcery that costs {2} with “Draw a card.”)[/i]
